*Embox* has base level architecture.

http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/EmboxArchitecture/arch.png

The lowest level as a hardware abstraction layer (HAL). The next is kernel level, usualy It supports resources allocation and internal communication. The next is driver and services level, And the highest is applications level.
